description: Rear dormer roof extension (involving conversion of roofspace to habitable use); installation of one rooflight to rear roofslope and window to side gable; and associated internal and external alterations
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings and document title number(s): 0907-P/EX/01 (Site Plan, Location Plan, Existing Plans, Existing Elevations and Existing Section); 0907-P/P/01 (Proposed Plans, Proposed Elevations and Proposed Section); 0907-P/W-S/01 (Window Schedule); 0907-P/DL-LW/01 Rev A (Cross Section Details of New Window Assembly SW1 - Double Glazed); 0907-P/DL-LW/02 Rev A (Cross Section Details of New Window Assembly SW2 - Double Glazed); Design and Access Statement Dated 28 June 2022
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be in accordance with those stated within the submitted application form and approved drawings and documents listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and conservation area in accordance with policies 7B, 7C, 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act (1990) and the NPPF (2021).
